initial_question.title: 关于微调
initial_question.body:
请问大佬
使用微调后的 pose_net.pth、face_encoder.pth、unet.pth 去做推理，推理时参考图片随便选择一张人物图，为啥推理出来生成的动画/视频都还是微调时候的人物，似乎参考图片的人物图并没有生效
请问这是为啥呢？

satisfaction_conditions: Training configuration correctly distinguishes between fine-tuning and fresh training modes

initial_question.title: How much VRAM does it need

satisfaction_conditions: System must operate within available VRAM constraints for specified resolutions
System must support multiple resolution options
VRAM usage must be accurately reported or predictable
System must maintain functionality at lower VRAM configurations
